## Summary
Brief description of the feature or improvement.

## Problem / Motivation
What problem does this solve? Why would this be useful?

## Suggested Solution
How do you envision this working?

## Alternatives Considered
Any other ways you've thought about solving this?

## Additional Context
Mockups, examples from other tools, or anything else that helps explain.
